author: K. Thor Jensen
title: TV Shows to Watch if You Love 'Stranger Things' - Slideshow from PCMag.com
text:
TV Shows to Watch if You Love 'Stranger Things' TV Shows to Watch if You Love 'Stranger Things' Click To View Slideshow Â» In withdrawal after finishing Netflix's Stranger Things? These shows will help tide you over. 
The Duffer Brothers' Stranger Things seemingly came out of nowhere to capture the world's imagination, and it paid off for Netflix. The show performed better than Daredevil and even prestige series House of Cards , and it's a foregone conclusion that a second season will be on the way soon. 
Whether it'll pick up from where the first season left off and continue the story of Eleven, Mike, Will, Dustin, and Lucas or do an American Horror Story and explore similar themes in a different place is anybody's guess. We're signed up for whatever. 
But what if you can't wait that long? Don't panic, buddy. There are plenty of insanely good TV shows streaming that capture one element or another of the Stranger Things vibe, and even if you're a dedicated binge watcher you won't be able to make it through all of them anytime soon. Here's our rundown of shows to watch to slake your thirst for weird science, small-town horror, and sweet synthesizers. 
( For more, check out an episode-by-episode breakdown of all the 80s references in Stranger Things from our sister site Geek.com. )
